alert.note: Alert for Barton; Cedar; Dade; Jasper; Lawrence; Vernon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 3:03AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Barton, southwestern Cedar, northwestern Lawrence, southeastern Vernon, northeastern Jasper and western Dade Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 303 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lamar, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carthage... Stockton Lake... Lamar... Carterville... Greenfield... Lockwood... Jasper... Golden City... Alba... Sheldon... Purcell... Carytown... Jerico Springs... Lamar Heights... Brooklyn Heights... South Greenfield... Irwin... Arcola... Milford... Maple Grove... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 42 and 77. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Barton; Cedar; Dade; Jasper; Lawrence; Vernon
